replies.body: Give Wukong some love, there's so much potential with the Master/Student story.

It's really hard to make wukong his own character without drifting from his basis in chinese mythology too much. Sun WuKong was literally an all powerful deity, able to match anyone in battle. The only being he couldn't overcome was the Buddha himself.
Alot of champions are based off real word deities/legends/myths - That shouldn't stop the lore being updated in a fictitious world.
That's true, but an updated bio that really cements his relationship with Master Yi would be very welcome.

The new kayle honestly looks meh compared to old (current) Kayle, but honestly really happy to see this re-work. My only worry is that shes now really emphasised as a LATE GAME MONSTER! i see the potential but the current kayle struggles with getting to late game.. Do you think that this will be the case with the re-work, if so can you guys find a way to boost her early game a little bit? 

Again am keen to see what she brings to the tables now but am worried she will still struggle early to mid game.
Agreed... but then most reworks they have to be tuned down for being overpowered... so fingers crossed she at least starts in a dominant / healthy early game place "pre-nerf".
wow, way to spoil ssbu world of light for us
